summary: As the title would suggest, La Mort du Cygne (The Death of the Swan) is set in the high art world of ballet. In fact, it is the first full length motion picture set in this world. It is ... See full summary »
cast: Yvette Chauviré|Mia Slavenska|Janine Charrat|France Ellys|Jean Périer|Mady Berry|Suzanne Guémard|Mauricette Cebron|Claire Gérard|Jacqueline Quéffelec|Micheline Boudet|Florence Luchaire|Claude Naudès|Marguerite Bailly|O. Boboli|Pierre Duprez|André Pernet|Maurice Baquet|Guy Laine|Rolla Norman|Pierre Sarda|Edmond Beauchamp|René Lord|L'École de Danse Théâtre National de l'Opéra
title: La mort du cygne
